name: World of Tanks Replay File
summary: Learn about .WOTREPLAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WOTREPLAY files do not store actual video data. Instead, they store locations, movements, and actions by each of the players, therefore allowing the replay to be re-simulated in the software.

description: Game file created by World of Tanks (WoT), a multiplayer tank battling game; saves a multiplayer battle replay that can be played back at a later time; saved to the \​World of Tanks\​Replays\​ installation directory if replay recording is enabled in the game options.
